entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enum.ToObject(Type, object) method overload handles nint and nuint types incorrectly #106098
  • CI failure RegularExpressions didn't throw expected TimeoutException #106096
  • CI failure in DecimalTests BigIntegerAdd #106095
  • WasmTestOnChrome-MT-System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests timeout #106094
  • Enable AltJit usage with disassembly-checked tests #106093
    Future
  • Analyzer 'Microsoft.NetCore.CSharp.Analyzers.Performance.CSharpConstantExpectedAnalyzer' threw an exception of type 'System.InvalidCastException` #106088
    Future
  • [Tracing] EventProvider Disposal hangs within a callback #106087
    10.0.0
  • failure in BidirectionStreamingTest.BackwardsCompatibility_DowngradeToHttp11 #106086
    8.0.x
  • Runtime crashing under WSL2 on Volterra #106081
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen with `AdvSimd.Insert` #106079
    9.0.0
  • [ppc64le] Unable to load the service index for source https://pkgs.dev.azure.com/dnceng/public/..../index.json #106074
  • [mono] FullAOT build asserts at `class1 != ARG_CLASS_NO_CLASS' for EmptyStructs.dll #106071
  • Object cloning does not work in maui #106077
  • [browser][MT] Could not load file or assembly System.Runtime.InteropServices #106067
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add TryGetReadOnlySpan<T>() to CollectionsMarshal for ReadOnlyCollection<T> #106066
  • [mono][ios] Mono prevents crash logs from being generated in case `SIGSEGV` is raised from native code #106064
    9.0.0
  • Performance delay when filtering a DataTable using the DefaultView.RowFilter property #106061

Closed

  • [GC] DATAS Startup time significantly worse than with workstation GC #94076
    9.0.0
  • ARM64: Fuzzlyn example Debug outputs `False` and Release outputs `True` #105413
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed '(intrinsicInfo.numArgs == -1) || (sig->numArgs == static_cast<uint8_t>(intrinsicInfo.numArgs))' during 'Morph - Inlining' (IL size 568; hash 0xb #105922
    9.0.0
  • tracing/eventpipe/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror failure #80666
    9.0.0
  • Dump file not created when process crashes #104256
    9.0.0
  • Add VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension support in mono #83891
    Future
  • ServiceDescriptor.ImplementationType throws exception for Keyed descriptor: System.InvalidOperationException: This service descriptor is keyed. Your service provider may not support keyed services. #95789
    9.0.0
  • Parameter name stripping breaks debugger #102873
    9.0.0
  • Assert in InsertPInvokeMethodEpilog #103853
    9.0.0
  • Different behavior of FromKeyedServices attribute in Minimal APIs handler vs class library #102204
    9.0.0
  • Unable to use a enum as a key for keyed services in controller constructor #96140
    9.0.0
  • Segmentation Fault while debugging #105917
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServiceLifetimeTests.ServiceCanStopItself #103262
    9.0.0
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServiceLifetimeTests.ServiceSequenceIsCorrect #93194
    9.0.0
  • Ensure argument validation is being done for the Tensor APIs #102267
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT doesn't apply `TrimmerSingleWarn=true` item metadata to the command line for the compiler #94255
    9.0.0
  • Audit the usage of `scoped` in the Tensor APIs #102266
    9.0.0
  • Add PersistedAssemblyBuilder tests to cover input and boundary cases #103086
    9.0.0
  • ILStrip task incorrectly adds a body to `extern` methods #102045
    9.0.0
  • Don't throw exception in ServiceDescriptor #99622
    9.0.0
  • [Apple] New Environment.CpuUsage tests failing on Apple mobile #105322
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed `user->OperIs(GT_CALL) && dsc->IsHiddenBufferStructArg() && (user->AsCall()->gtArgs.GetRetBufferArg()->GetNode() == lcl)` #105952
    9.0.0
  • Test failure:JIT/Methodical/doublearray/dblarray4_cs_ro/dblarray4_cs_ro.cmd #106057
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: Regressions in System.Collections.IndexerSet<String> #98174
    9.0.0
  • DefaultValueAttribute support change introduce new linker warnings #105857
    9.0.0
  • JIT: checked-release asmdiffs for libraries_tests.run.linux.arm64.Release.mch #105971
    9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Tests for Sve.AddSaturate() are failing #105799
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/RuntimeConfiguration/TestConfigTester/TestConfigTester.dll #103547
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Buffers.ArrayPool.Tests - Could not allocate #102195
    9.0.0
  • Error when calling a method from the NativeAOT static library. #105915
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 11 Regressions on 10/25/2023 1:04:28 PM #94228
    9.0.0
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Anlyzer for wrong usage of interpolated string with Logger methods #106041
    Future
  • NativeAOT (net9.0) error on linux-bionic-arm/arm64 #105880
    9.0.0
  • TimeZoneInfo_DisplayNameStartsWithOffset failures for Syria and Greenland #99727
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [CG] Bump Microsoft.IO.Redist to 6.0.1 #106102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Enable TLS on linux/arm64 only for static resolver #106101
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • For `Sse41.Insert`, do not contain vec-zero on op1/op2 if the immediate value is greater than 63 #106100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Check HFA alignment for valuetype fields #106099
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add package readme to framework packages #106097
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • JIT: Skip `GT_CAST` removal in `Lowering::IsValidConstForMovImm` if it might change immediate #106092
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure XML doc comments exist for the nested classes and IsSupported properties for intrinsics #106091
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Consume the existing instruction metadata when validating expected memory size #106090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove `unsafe` modifier from `Memory<T>.Span` #106085
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Added all missing xml docs for Tensors #106084
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • STJ-SG: tolerate ref struct members with JsonIgnore. #106083
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Add os-ios, os-android etc labels to area section in resourceManagement.yml #106082
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Be more cautious about page zeroing #106080
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono
  • Add space in shared lib entrypoint option #106073
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Debug interp pgo test #106070
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-browser
  • [iOS][HybridGlobalization] Handle small buffer case in sortkey #106062
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix TimeZone Names #106056
    Servicing-consider, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Set the initial spin count unit to 10 for DATAS. #105634
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Enable TLS on linux/arm64 only for static resolver #106052
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix loop memory dependence recording for memory defined in sibling loops #106076
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Use correct IL offset when reporting dataflow warnings for return statements #105661
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [EventPipe] Block EventPipeProvider Deletion for ongoing callbacks #106040
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Linux createdump: skip/ignore ptrace suspend on threads that have terminated #106058
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • ILLink: Keep parameter names unless DebuggerSupport is disabled #105714
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Split trees containing no-return calls to avoid creating illegal IR #105942
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Do not allow a non-keyed service to be injected to a keyed parameter #105839
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • ActivatorUtilitier supports value typed values as key of keyedService. #106059
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Avoid calling GetCurrentInternalFrame if ExhaustedAllInternalFrames is true #106060
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix flaky tests in WindowsServiceLifetimeTests #105666
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix copy constructor injection for unsafe value classes #105961
    Servicing-approved, arch-x86, os-windows, area-Interop-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] longer timeouts for FS in MT, one test at the time #106078
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Pass `ManagedAssemblyToLink` with `TrimmerSingleWarn=true` metadata to ILC #106069
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Return null instead of throwing in ServiceDescriptor.ImplementationInstance\Type\Factory if a keyed service #105776
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Bump additional npm deps and lock file format #106019
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net
  • Add/update AssemblyBuilder/PersistedAssemblyBuilder tests covering boundary / edge case scenarios #105782
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Try Fix Cpu Usage Test #105891
    area-System.Runtime, 9.0.0
  • Use SVE1 variants of AddSaturate and SubtractSaturate instructions #106068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Expose top-level address computations in local morph #106065
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Use `jitstd::utility::scoped_code` to unmark trees during lowering #106046
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix code generation for type conversion from float/double to uint/ulong. #105783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [wasm] Fix long branches in jiterpreter #106030
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Make sure get_total_soh_stable_size never return zero #106043
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] Mark AOT modules unusable if no AOT version is found #106026
    os-android, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] HijackFrame::UpdateRegDisplay update A0 #106018
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [NativeAOT] Move RequiresAlign8 flag from RareFlags into ExtendedFlags #106010
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [PERF] Remove --user from pip installs #106055
    area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure owning type of GVMs is kept #106016
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • EventSource startup initialization #106014
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • Fixed a broken build with STRESS_DYNAMIC_HEAP_COUNT enabled #105507
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2510925 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix `Int128` checked-convert to signed IntX #105998
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Fix resolving types with primary constructors using in parameters #105928
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Added AsReadOnly() extension to ISet<T> #106037
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix trim analysis for assignment to multiple refs in single method call #105663
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Model GetFfr* with a special side effect and handle it in VN #105973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Error out when struct size is bigger than int.MaxValue #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Bring back assert in fx_ver_t::parse #106050
    area-Host
  • Fix input size flag on `vpermd`. #106054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove implicit flush from BufferedStream.WriteByte #104822
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, Future
  • Arm64/Sve: DelayfreeUses for FMLA should take into account CndSel for RMW #105541
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Obsolete ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType and HashAlgorithmType and their usage #105875
    area-System.Net.Security, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix compilation of NativeAOT with Xcode 16 #106039
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WASI] timers based on wasi:clocks #105879
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Add WebSocket Keep-Alive Ping and Timeout (minimal) implementation #105841
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • TimeOnlyConverter should tolerate more formats in line with TimeSpanConverter #106053
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add memory barriers to native AOT asm helpers #106004
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #106045
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix some core typeof(...) references #105903
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.LoadVector*FirstFaulting APIs #104964
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Assign latest virtual timestamp for added node to enable LRU manner of RegexCache #105746
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [browser][mono] Heap snapshot system for WASM #105713
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Add support for doubly nested intrinsic classes #105761
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add DI specification test for ensuring externally provided instance services are not disposed on provider disposal. #104853
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Avoid containing non-embedded conditional select #105719 #105812
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Test llvm bump #105867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix a nested-externs warning in mono #104817
    area-Tracing-mono, community-contribution
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods and optimise `Shuffle` for non-constant `indices` #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add Ubuntu 24.04 Helix Images to pipeline #106048
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] Emit Align8 flag for thread statics #105931
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Creating new TypeName without reparsing + usage in NRBF #103713
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, binary-serialization
  • fix infinite loop in foregroundgc test #106006
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added a fix for an incorrect assumption of an assertion failure re: failure to decommit. #105849
    area-GC-coreclr
